project1.title: Bear Watcher
project1.description: This is an exercise designed to practice modules, JavaScript, and Bootstrap. It features a form where the user can enter a bear's name and image and see it displayed on the page. Then the user can observe the bear's behavior and track in real time its fishing attempts and successes, with the overall number of successes displayed as total number of fish caught.

project2.title: Chatty App - Narnia Theme
project2.description: This was a four-person group project to build a chat app for multiple users to interact with. It enables users to select their name, add messages to the chat screen, delete a message, or clear all messages. It also features dark mode and large text options, as well as a section where the user can choose their own custom theme colors.

project3.title: Tamagotchi
project3.description: This page features four sections with buttons and various status levels for a virtual pet. When clicked, the buttons affect the status levels by a certain amount, with the values always staying between 0 and 100. The design is responsive.

project5.title: Cool Project 5
project5.technologiesUsed: HTML, CSS, Vanilla JavaScript, Version Control with Github
